overview: Disneynature Predator and Prey showcases the unending battle for survival that exists in nature. Students will journey on land and under sea for a riveting look at many species – from caribou and cheetahs to sea lions and sharks – as they both stalk their prey and also avoid being stalked themselves. From the amazing variety of adaptations that both predators and prey are equipped with to avoid capture, to the natural order of a food chain, this Classroom Edition DVD highlights the important role predation plays in keeping an animal’s world in balance.
title: Disneynature: Predator and Prey
